Riders Manual

Delivering excellence to every doorstep. Your guide to success with Hungr.

Getting Started

Registration

  • 1 Click "Register here" on the login screen.
  • 2 Upload a professional profile picture and valid Driver's License.
  • 3 Specify your Vehicle Type (Motorcycle, Car, or Van) and Plate Number.

Going Online

Toggle the Go Online button to start finding orders. The system uses your GPS location to match you with nearby merchants.

Keep your app open and GPS active for the best experience.

The Delivery Lifecycle

1

Accepting an Opportunity

When an order matches, review the fee and distance. Click Accept Order to begin.

2

Merchant Pickup & Security

Navigate to the merchant. Once there, show your 6-digit Dispatch Code. This is required for the merchant to release the order.

The Dispatch Code ensures the right rider picks up the right order.
3

Final Fulfillment

Once released, navigate to the customer. After handover, click Order Delivered. Your earnings are credited instantly.
